name: Coincide Episode 2 Free Demo (Windows)
description:
Ulnia after destroying the Satyr Cult's strongholds, now returns to her home Terraguard but finds it has been attacked by what remained of the Satyrs. she must now drive away all of them and save her city from assimilation.

this demo features the first 4 levels of the full release, everything in said demo is subject to change.
